scripts.start: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REACT_APP_ENV=local REACT_APP_BRANDING=silkroadonlightning REACT_APP_LOGO=camel_logo.jpg REACT_APP_DESCRIPTION='Silk Road on Lightning' react-scripts start

scripts.start-eccentricprotocol: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REACT_APP_ENV=local REACT_APP_BRANDING=eccentricprotocol REACT_APP_LOGO=eccentricprotocol.png REACT_APP_DESCRIPTION='Eccentric Protocol' react-scripts start
scripts.build: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REACT_APP_ENV=prod REACT_APP_BRANDING=silkroadonlightning REACT_APP_LOGO=camel_logo.jpg REACT_APP_DESCRIPTION='Silk Road on Lightning' react-scripts build
scripts.build-eccentricprotocol: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REACT_APP_ENV=prod REACT_APP_BRANDING=eccentricprotocol REACT_APP_LOGO=eccentricprotocol.png REACT_APP_DESCRIPTION='Eccentric Protocol' react-scripts build
